author: vmassol
msg: - Last bout of refactoring to support delegates instead of class hierarchies. Everything is working fine on my machine now. Back to normal.

author: vmassol
msg: Fixed bug in during the last refactoring. Pure junit tests can now be executed again successfully on the server side. Still one bug to go...

author: vmassol
msg: Big refactoring to remove the XXXTestCase class hiearchy, replacing it by a delegator implementation so that we don't have to expose unncesseary non public API and to give us some freedom to modify the implementation in the future without breaking binary compatibility.

author: vmassol
msg: Use TestCase instead of tying up the implementation with some Cactus specific class

author: vmassol
msg: Deprecated getCurrentTestMethod() and replaced it by getCurrentTestName() which is a better name.
